akas: You Are Too Much World-wide (English title) (alternative spelling)
akas from release info: You Are Too Much World-wide (English title) (alternative spelling)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Famous yet lonely singer Yoo Ji Na strikes up an unlikely friendship with Hae Dang, an impersonator who works to support her family.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Ji Na finds herself warming up to Hae Dang and, unexpectedly, Sung Taek. Na Kyung struggles against her place in her in-laws' strict family structure.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Hae Dang is hurt when Ji Na says she owes her a debt for singing her songs without permission. Ji Na considers retiring.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Ji Na's modeling client offers to be a shoulder to cry on. Hae Dang and Kyung Soo have gotten close.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Hae Jin gets frustrated when everyone tells her she should be making more money. Ji Na struggles to decide what to do about her relationship with Chairman Park.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hae Dang tells Ji Na that she can't be bought off with an agency contract. Kyung Soo opens up to Hae Dang about how he was abandoned by his mother.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Mi Sook worries that she caused the marital rift between Hae Jin and Bong Soo when she took the allowance. Hyun Joon tries again to win over Hae Dang.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Hae Dang contemplates the emptiness of her life over too many drinks. Ji Na decides she likes living in Chairman Park's house despite his mother's efforts to drive her out.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Bong Soo is upset when Hae Jin introduces him as her uncle. Na Kyung gets nervous when Hyun Sung's old girlfriend comes back to Korea and his grandmother tries to push Na Kyung out of his life.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Questioning his mother's death, Hyun Joon reaches out to Kyung Soo for the letter that his mother left for him. Kyung Soo is jealous when he sees Hae Dang with Hyun Joon.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Na Kyung's plan to ruin Chairman Park's relationship with his son seems to be on track, but it looks like Grandmother has found out what she is up to.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Upset about their financial woes, Bong Soo goes out and gets drunk. Hyun Joon sets up an audition with a broadcaster and Hae Dang panics. Chairman Park digs around in Ji Na's past.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Hae Dang realizes just how connected she is to Ji Na. Kang Shik has a harrowing afternoon when he offers to help Mi Sook practice driving.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Bong Seon considers taking a job as a housekeeper. Hyun Joon prepares to tell Hae Dang how he feels about her.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Chairman Park tries to push Hyun Joon to marry Yoon Hee in two months. Bong Seon, flush with cash, takes her family out to dinner.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Hae Jin and Bong Soo tell their families that they are going to get a divorce. Kyung Soo shares his feelings for Hae Dang. Na Kyung tries to find out Ji Na's secret weakness.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Na Kyung decides to call Kyung Soo for lessons so that she can try to figure out his connection to Ji Na. Hae Dang's first television performance does not get the reaction they had hoped.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Kyung Ja humiliates Ji Na at the engagement ceremony. Hae Dang is affected by Ji Na's negative publicity.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Ji Na goes to see her son. Hyun Joon tries to get closer to Hae Dang's father by taking him shopping.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Chairman Park's mother is overjoyed to hear that he and Ji Na decided to break up. Ji Na begs Chairman Park not to let his mother tarnish her reputation any more than it already is.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: The media swarm like sharks around the house looking for more tidbits about Ji Na. Kang Shik is convinced that Bong Soo is having an affair. Kyung Soo confronts his mother.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Kang Shik invites Kyung Soo to spend more time with the family and Bong Soo tries to teach him how to drink. Yoo Ji Na wants her son to break up with Hae Dang.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Kyung Soo is horrified when his mother tells him he can never reveal that he is her son. Hyun Joon is still trying to find an original song for Hae Dang to sing.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Kyung Ja explains to her son why she is so concerned about him marrying Yoo Ji Na. Ji Na pleads with Hae Dang to stop seeing her son.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Chairman Park questions Ji Na's loyalty and love for him. Hae Dang tells Ji Na that she will not back down.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Bong Soo may have been conned out of some money. Ji Na's new position does not improve her relationship with Kyung Ja.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Kyung Soo learns about Hae Dang and Ji Na's shared past. Na Kyung and Yoon Hee continue to try to torment Ji Na.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Grandmother is stirring up trouble again by bringing up Kyung Ae's death. Yoon Hee pressures Hyun Joon to make wedding preparations.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Yoo Ji Na must deal with Kyung Soo's announcement. Hae Dang makes a surprising request of Hyun Joon.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Hae Dang and Kyung Soo find it difficult to see each other. Yoon Hee's determination to marry Hyun Joon does not waver.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Hyun Joon's grandmother and father take to Hae Dang. Yoo Ji Na crosses Hae Dang and tries to get the family on her side.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Chairman Park gives Kyung Soo an ultimatum to get what he wants. Yoo Ji Na and the her in-law face off in a battle of wits with Hae Dang and Hyun Joon caught in the middle. Rumors spread about the relationship between Baek Mi Sook and her in-law.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Hae Dang pushes Kyung Soo away. Hae Jin and Mi Sook go to meet Na Kyung to discuss the wedding.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Emotions run hot when Chairman Park threatens to give all of his shares in the company to Kyung Soo.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Bong Soo tries to set up Kang Shik with a woman from his office. Na Kyung continues to push Ji Na and Chul Woo together.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Yoo Ji Na asks her son to choose between her and Hae Dang. Bong Soo tries to convince Kang Shik to go on another date.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Grandmother and Hyun Joon figure out what is going on with Yoo Ji Na. Hae Dang and Hyun Joon decide to move forward with their nuptial plans.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: The family tries to figure out how what happened that caused Grandmother to collapse. With Grandmother out of the house, the power dynamics shift.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Yoo Ji Na is desperate to keep Grandmother from waking up and tries to make Kyung Soo an unwilling participant in her scheme.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Grandmother invites Hae Dang's family over for a meal. Hae Jin can't hide her embarrassment.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Hae Dang and Hyun Joon try to figure out who dug up the evidence. Mr. Jung finally gets his gas station.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Yoo Ji Na is kicked out of the house, but she does not go quietly. Everyone is convinced that Kyung Soo has the evidence.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Kyung Soo worries that Yoo Ji Na might have been kidnapped. Na Kyung plays on Kyung Soo's fears to try to get him to give her the evidence.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Grandmother takes Kyung Soo's side. The family is excited to meet Bong Seon's new boyfriend.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Everyone is worried that Kyung Soo might not recover. Mi Sook thinks Bong Seon needs a lot of new things for her wedding, and Hae Jin has to put her foot down.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Hae Dang's song exceeds expectations, but that excitement is tempered by concern for Kyung Soo.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Hyun Joon confronts his father. Chairman Park tries to figure out how to get out of this mess. Hae Jin realizes how much Mi Sook has been doing for the family.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Grandmother tries to come to terms with Chairman Park's situation. Na Kyung, still looking out for herself, tells Chairman Park that she will clear his name.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: The family misses Mi Sook and Mi Sook has trouble adapting to life with her new son-in-law. Hae Dang tries to get Hyun Sung to give Na Kyung one more chance.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: In the season finale, Kang Shik makes a bold move. Na Kyung convinces the family to go on a camping trip together. Hae Dang discovers some big news.

imdb.plot outline: Two new episodes added every Thursday! Uhm Jung Hwa (Venus Talk, Witch's Romance) and Jang Hee Jin (My Shy Boss, Mirror of the Witch) star in a drama about a woman who gave up something she loved for fame, only to meet someone who has nothing but still supports the ones she loves. When a singer with a deep-seated pain comes across an imitator with a family to feed, both their lives are changed forever. Yoo Ji Na (Uhm Jung Hwa) is a beloved pop singer and celebrity. She is gorgeous, confident and turns heads everywhere she goes.But past all her hallyu good looks and superstar smile is a deep-seated regret. 20 years ago, Yoo Ji Na was not a star. She was a young woman, desperate for success. In her desperation, Yoo Ji Na left behind her son, abandoning him to focus on getting fame. When her child needed her, she failed him. She found success, but lost the one that mattered. Jung Hae Dang (Jang Hee Jin) is a performer. Most wouldn't know her name, which they think is "ridiculous." She is not famous. She is not gorgeous. She is like a hundred other people we cross on the street without sending a second look their way. But it's not her nameher fans care about. It's the fact that she is a goodYoo Ji Naimpersonator. She is also the main breadwinner for her family ever since her dad lost his job. When she recognizes there is a demand for her talent, Jung Hae Dang starts impersonating the famous singer at a clubto support her loved ones. So when the original Yoo Ji Na meets thecopycat Jung Hae Dang, the two couldnot be more apart. Can they learn what fate is trying to teach them by bringing them together, or will the singer and the faker just become way too much for another? There is also Lee Kyung Soo (Kang Tae Oh from Miss Korea), a blind piano player who lost his parents and his sight in an accident, but has grown up to be quite the charmer. Plus, there is also Park Hyun Joon (Jung Gyu Woon from Oh My Venus), a "perfect chaebol" who harbors a deep hatred for his
imdb.title: You're Too Much
